result.execSummary:
The defendant Demond L Martin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Court imposes 5 days jail in lieu of payment of costs. Time Served.

Case 15CM1612 was dismissed and read in.
Straight Time. Sentence credit of 51 days were granted. Time Served.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demond L Martin

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Demond L Martin in court, in custody, with Attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.   Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count #1.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #1.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Weathers makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  30 DAYS JAIL  (51 DAYS CREDIT)    **TIME SERVED**

COSTS:   $253.00  (in lieu of payment of fine, court imposes alternate 5 days jail - TIME SERVED)
Notice of Hearing returned, for hearing scheduled on: 10/08/15.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 10-08-2015 03:45 pm
Dated 09/22/15, from Atty Weathers to Judge Carter, requesting earlier date for sentencing for the Defendant.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 11-03-2015 02:30 pm
Plea/sentencing hearing at 09-23-2015 10:00 am

Defendant Demond L Martin in court, in custody, with Attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.   Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Weathers requests an adjourned date.   Attorney Weathers requests bail modification.  State objects to bail modification request.  Court denies request.    Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 23, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.    Defendant to have no contact with codefendant or business listed in the criminal complaint.

Defendant Demond L Martin in court, in custody, with attorney Sam Benedict for attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.   Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant allowed to have phone call to obtain bail.  Hearing scheduled for September 1, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
Date on warrant to be corrected, the re-issued.

Case called at 3:12 pm. for a hearing.   Attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers in court.   Defendant Demond L Martin did not appear.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court lifts stay and issues capias.
Hearing on July 30, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers in court.   Defendant Demond L Martin did not appear.  District Attorney's Office Law Intern Konrad Paczuski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court received notification from Defendant that he cannot appear today due to no ride.     Court ordered a capias stayed until next court date.  Hearing scheduled for July 30, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
Hearing on July 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant to have no contact with any Target Store or any of the co-defendants.

Defendant Demond L Martin in court, in custody, with attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for July 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Demond L Martin
Current: 2413 N 16th St, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 05-19-2015)
Prior: 4515 N 36th St #9, Milwaukee, WI 53209
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
Defendant Demond L Martin not in court.  Timothy F. Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
